text: cng klaw theid (muhammad) wa than thanghlay cng ma kan theid chan ca xan hı fang sing thi phracea khxng phwk than di ham wi kæ phwk than khux phwk cea xya hı sing hnung sing dı pen phakhi kab phraxngkh læa cng tha di tx phu bangkeid kela thang sxng cring «læa xya kha luk khxng phwk cea neuxngcak khwam cn rea pen phu hı paccay yangchiph kæ phwk cea læa kæ phwk khea læa cng xya khea kıl brrda sing chawcha thang thi peidphey læa thi pkpid læa xya kha chiwit thi xallxhˌ thrng ham wi nxkcak dwy siththi xan chxbthrrm theanan nanhæla thi phraxngkh di thrng sang seiy man wi kæ phwk cea pheux wa phwk cea ca chı payya
